subject: Re: BADPURA ATM DOWN
bodyText: Dear Vivek Sir,I am writing to inform you that the ATM at our Badpura (Mansa) branch is currently non-functional. Upon inspection, we found that it had been disconnected.We have initiated a First Line Maintenance (FLM) call for an engineer visit tomorrow. Please assign a dedicated person to coordinate with the Optimal engineer for this visit.Kindly prioritize this matter.On Thu, Feb 12, 2026 at 6:25 PM ATM atm <atm@mdcc.bank.in> wrote:Dear Sanjay,Following our telephonic conversation, please arrange for an engineer to visit the Badpura site tomorrow. Please ensure the engineer brings a laptop for the visit.On Thu, Feb 12, 2026 at 1:14 PM Team Optimal <support@optimaltele.net> wrote:Dear Sir,This is with reference to your fault ticket number: TKT 20260212-15We have checked end to end media. There isn't any abnormality found in last mile media.The link is already up from our end. Kindly refer below log for your reference.LOGS: GUJ-GNR-MANSA-MDCC-PE#ping 10.200.22.171 repeat 1000 size 1500Type escape sequence to abort.Sending 1000, 1500-byte ICMP Echos to 10.200.22.171, timeout is 2 seconds:!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Success rate is 100 percent (1000/1000), round-trip min/avg/max = 4/6/24 msRFO : No issue in last mile media.For further clarification or feedback, please feel free to call on our helpdesk 079 69141300 or email us on support@optimaltele.netWe are glad to assist you & assured to best service always.Thanking in advanced.Faizan SolankiTeam Optimal Support Helpdesk Optimal Telemedia Pvt Ltd P: 079-69141300 W: http://www.optimaltele.net / http://www.jtminternet.com “Please do not print this mail if not really needed” Save Paper, Save Environment!!
